service.name: Jenkins Slave
service.description: Runs the Jenkins agent so the machine can be used as a build slave.
service.arguments: -jar {{ jenkins_slave_agent_path }} -jnlpUrl http://{{ jenkins_master_dns }}/computer/{{ windows_rust_slave_full_name }}/slave-agent.jnlp -secret SECRET_PLACEHOLDER -workDir {{ windows_rust_slave_working_path }}
